Module for embeddings_sparse.bm25.

NavMap: - BM25Doc: Bm25doc. - PurePythonBM25: Simple offline BM25 builder & searcher (Okapi BM25). - LuceneBM25: Pyserini-backed Lucene BM25 adapter. - get_bm25: Get bm25.

class src.embeddings_sparse.bm25.PurePythonBM25(index_dir, k1=0.9, b=0.4, field_boosts=None)[source][source]#

Simple offline BM25 builder & searcher (Okapi BM25).

Persisted as a pickle. Fields: title, section, body with configurable boosts.

Parameters:

  • k1 (float)
